kentauros.conntest module¶

kentauros.conntest module connectivity test to arbitrary URL

kentauros.conntest.is_connected(url)[source]¶

kentauros.conntest.is_connected(): function that tests if the host behind “url” is reachable

kentauros.definitions module¶

kentauros.definitions module contains definition of ktr system datadir used everywhere and enum definitions for: - ktr configuration types - ktr action types - builder types - constructor types - source types - uploader types

Module contents¶

This file contains the ‘run’ main function that is called when the package is executed by the setuptools-installed ‘ktr’ script.
